prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Guitar, Piano, Strings, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Pipe, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Strings, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Pipe, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Strings, omitting the Synth Lead.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Pipe, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Guitar
